alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Jasper; Madison; Marion; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 11:19PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Polk, Madison, western Marion, western Jasper, Dallas and Warren Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1119 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of State Center to Drake Stadium And Knapp Center to 12 miles northwest of Lakeside Casino. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Norwalk, Pleasant Hill and Southridge Mall around 1130 PM CDT. Carlisle around 1135 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Baxter, Indianola, Colfax and Newton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 44 and 72, and between mile markers 87 and 101. Interstate 80 between mile markers 102 and 165. Interstate 235 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central and south central Iowa.

area.areaDesc: Dallas; Jasper; Madison; Marion; Polk; Warren
